channel.title: CVE Feed for github -- cmark-gfm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for github -- cmark-gfm

item.title: CVE-2020-5238|2024-08-04T08:22:09.078Z -- github -- cmark-gfm
item.description: The table extension in GitHub Flavored Markdown before version 0.29.0.gfm.1 takes O(n * n) time to parse certain inputs. An attacker could craft a markdown table which would take an unreasonably long time to process, causing a denial of service. This issue does not affect the upstream cmark project. The issue has been fixed in version 0.29.0.gfm.1.
